## DataCamp Certification Types

### Technology Certification: Validate your skills in a technology
- Data Analyst
- Data Scientist
- Data Engineer

### Career Certification: Prove that you can perform in a role
- SQL Associate Certification
- Exam PL-300: Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst (in partnership with Microsoft)
- Tableau Certified Data Analyst 
- Azure Fundamentals-  (in partnership with Microsoft) 50% OFF AZ-900 EXAM 
- Alteryx Fundamentals

### Fundamentals Certification: Showcase knowledge of key concepts
- AI Fundamentals
- Data Literacy
